name: Epic Vampire
description:
You must Bite ALL of the people to make them into Vampires.

Collect ALL Bitecoins.

Use Speed Boost to traverse quickly across the Map.

Transform into Goth Vamp.

Use a Powerball to stun victims.

Drive a Hearse in a race against time.

Fly as a Bat over the City to new heights.

If You are out in the Sunlight too long, You will catch on fire.

Biting People restores some of Your Health.

* This game has Permadeath, so, If You Die or Quit, You have to start over from the beginning. *
